snippet: Fox Sports 1’s marketing of a Mexico-United States game caused a stir on Friday with a commercial using comments made by Donald J. Trump.

lead_paragraph: Fox Sports 1’s marketing of a Mexico-United States game caused a stir on Friday with a commercial using comments made by Donald J. Trump.

headline.main: Fox Video Featuring Donald Trump Angers United States Soccer Fans
